Name: Bullet Dodge
About the game: “Bullet Dodge? Are you telling me I can dodge bullets?” Right. Dodge, block, or shoot them. Whatever you do, survive. Don’t get hit in the head or it’s game over. Use your amazing reflexes to dodge out of the way of an onslaught of bullets. Use your shields to block bullets that get too close. And use your gun to shoot incoming projectiles out of the sky and impress your friends. Things getting out of hand? Use your slow time ability to get the edge. But be careful. The flow of time is a constant that should not be meddled with. When your slow time ability stops, the world will move faster to get back to where it should be. Each level requires only that you survive, but mere survival won’t get you to the top of the leaderboard. For that, you’ll need to be fast, quick, and accurate. Maybe get creative and find the hidden bonus levels too.
